Incidents.IncidentText: John Doe was born. It was rather disappointing really.
He became one of our happy customers

Clients.Name: Lord Abragator
Clients.Bio: Beware his 40 barrel gunship. It soars high through the air, using steam powered propellers. It's only known weakness, alligators.

Incidents.IncidentText: Lord Abragator was born, and the devil shivered with fear
The 40 barrel gunship mark III was launched, and his reign of terror was extended to the air
He became one of our happy customers
The 40 barrel gunship mark III was constructed

Clients.Name: Wesley
Clients.Bio: He enjoys a nice cup of Earl Grey. Sometimes mixes a bit of Baileys in there too. Lovely.

Incidents.IncidentText: Wesley was born. It was rather disappointing really.
He bought English Breakfast instead of Earl Grey
He became one of our happy customers
